description: biostatistical approach to elucidate key molecules of the initial stages of stroke pathophysiology and highlight new outstanding proteins that might be further considered as blood biomarkers of ischemic stroke.

title: A mouse brain-based multi-omics integrative approach reveals potential blood biomarkers for ischemic stroke
